subject: Didn't like the sine wave.
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Yeah, another noisy, distored car tuner. Linear--triangle sweep. In AM at 8
seconds "Purple-This Box Won't Sell", and FM-slower at 4 seconds "volcano
blows" and at 10 seconds "volcanos".

  Frank-S

Yeah, ano he noisy, dis o ed ca une . Linea -- iangle sweep. In AM a 8 seconds "Pu ple-This Box Won' Sell", and FM-slowe a 4 seconds " olcano blows" and a 10 seconds " olcanos".

 
  F ank-S
